snippet: Television news viewers proved curious about ABC anchor Elizabeth Vargas' battle with alcoholism, with her return to "20/20" on Friday night earning the newsmagazine's biggest audience in four years....

headline.print_headline: ABC Anchor Vargas' Return Interests TV Viewers
headline.main: ABC Anchor Vargas' Return Interests TV Viewers

lead_paragraph: Television news viewers proved curious about ABC anchor Elizabeth Vargas' battle with alcoholism, with her return to "20/20" on Friday night earning the newsmagazine's biggest audience in four years.
